NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Repair and maintenance services of central heating

CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Modification of a contract/concession during its term
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 08C20

TI_TEXT.P: Услуги по поддържане на газови уреди
Servicios de mantenimiento de aparatos de gas
Usluge popravaka i održavanja plinskih naprava
Servizi di manutenzione di apparecchiature a gas
Servizzi ta' manutenzjoni ta' apparat tal-gass
Usługi w zakresie konserwacji aparatury gazowej
Serviços de manutenção de aparelhos a gás
Servicii de întreţinere a aparatelor cu gaz

TITLE.P: Heating Service, Repair Maintenance, Installation and Associated Works

SHORT_DESCR.P: This framework is the provision of heating service, repair maintenance and installation to the PfH members, this will include 24/365 repair maintenance for a PfH members specified property portfolio, inclusive of an out of hours emergency service, annual servicing (commercial and domestic) and system installation. All applicants must hold the necessary qualification to complete works - Gas Safe, MCS, NICEIC, HETAS, OFTEC. The first area encompasses Service only (1*), Service and Repair Maintenance and Heating Service, Repair Maintenance and Installation (3*) offering the installation rate as a set price through SOR’s, inclusive of visual checks included in the service element for CO and Smoke alarms. The second area covers Service only (1*), and Heating Service, Repair Maintenance and Installation (3*) for commercial boilers. The third area provides a full compliant cover for Heating Service, Repair and maintenance and installation (3* and 5*), this will cover both domestic and commercial properties and is inclusive of visual CO and Smoke detector checks and installation rates for (3*) agreement with the (5*) agreement including the price of a boiler replacement over the lifespan of the contract specified by the PfH member at tender stage.

TITLE.P: Heating Service, Repair Maintenance, Installation and Associated Works

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: Unit B2 Senator Point, South Boundary Road, South Boundary Road
Thames House, Stone Foundries Estate, 669 Woolwich Road
Garden Works Charleywood Road, Knowsley Industrial Park,

SHORT_DESCR.P: The expectation of this framework is the provision of heating service, repair maintenance and installation to the PfH members, this will include 24/365 repair maintenance for a PfH members specified property portfolio,inclusive of an out of hours emergency service, annual servicing (commercial and domestic) and systeminstallation. All applicants must hold the necessary qualification to complete works — Gas Safe, MCS, NICEIC,HETAS, OFTEC. The first area encompasses Service only (1*), Service and Repair Maintenance and HeatingService, Repair Maintenance and Installation (3*) offering the installation rate as a set price through SOR's,inclusive of visual checks included in the service element for CO and Smoke alarms. The second area coversService only (1*), and Heating Service, Repair Maintenance and Installation (3*) for commercial boilers. Thethird area provides a full compliant cover for Heating Service, Repair and maintenance and installation (3*and 5*), this will cover both domestic and commercial properties and is inclusive of visual CO and Smoke detector checks and installation rates for (3*) agreement with the (5*) agreement including the price of a boilerreplacement over the lifespan of the contract specified by the PfH member at tender stage.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: Unit B2 Senator Point, South Boundary Road, South Boundary Road
Garden Works, Charley Wood Road, Knowsley
Thames House, Stone Foundries Estate,, 669 Woolwich Road,

SHORT_DESCR.P: The current PfH Heating Service, Repair Maintenance, Installation and Associated Works Framework was awarded in May 2015 for an initial three year term with an optional extension of a further 12 months up to May 2020. This optional extension was applied and the current contract is due to expire on 3rd May 2020. The Framework Agreement was due to be re-tendered, however, the original deadline was extended due to uncertainty following the acceleration of the Covid-19 crisis in the UK with concern over staff absences and business priorities being focused elsewhere. With the announcement on the 23rd March and the imposition of significant business restrictions it is clear that many organisations within this market are temporarily ceasing trade and have indicated they will be unable to submit a response to the tender.

PfH is committed to providing high quality frameworks that are competitive, offer the best products and services and provide access to suppliers with in depth experience and knowledge of the industry. In order to ensure we can continue to offer a high quality product PfH intend to extend the current framework under Regulation 72(1)(c) for a further 12 months. As there remains significant uncertainty as to how long the Covid-19 crisis will continue and the inevitable disruption as business returns to normal we believe a 12 month extension will allow the industry to stabilise and ensure the future tender process is competitive. PfH confirms that the modification does not change the overall nature of the contract and the modification will not exceed 50 % of the original contract value.

UNFORESEEN_CIRCUMSTANCE.P: With the imposition of significant business restrictions it is clear that many organisations within this market are temporarily ceasing trade and have indicated they will be unable to submit a response to any tender.
In order to ensure we can continue to offer a high quality product PfH intend to extend the current framework under Regulation 72(1)(c) for a further 12 months.
